General.Name: Crescent Energy Co
General.Description: Crescent Energy Company, an energy company, engages in the exploration and production of crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids in the United States. Its activities are focused in Texas and the Rocky Mountain region. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 600 Travis Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77002
